Subject: Need root password of DLP Server
Description: Dear Team, we forgot the root password of DLP server. Need help in accessing root password of DLP Server
What_We_Know__c:
27.05
- the customer forgot the password for their root account
- I asked to clarify if they mean the user with which they log in to the UI
- asked who the customer is - Law Offices of Panag & Babu
- told the customer the default password and if that doesn't work we'll schedule a remote session
- default password is not working
- asked for their timezone so I can schedule a RS
- scheduled the call on the 28th

28.05
- the customer wanted SSH access
- told them the procedure for it during the call
Next_Steps__c:
27.05
- waiting on the customer for further details - to let us know if the default password works
- waiting on customer's timezone
- waiting on the RS

28.05
- waiting on the customer/ticket closure
Solution_Comment__c:
- the root password was reset
- told the customer we can't offer SSH access, unless they agree to a legal document
- they confirmed the ticket can be closed as they don't want that
